import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets books from the Google API
getBooks:function getBooks(query){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(query));},// Gets all saved books
getSavedBooks:function getSavedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// Deletes the saved book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);},// Saves a book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books/",bookData);}};
